chlorophytum.story

Class StoryDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • chlorophytum.story.StoryDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StoryEvent

    public class StoryDialog
extends java.lang.Object
implements StoryEvent
    StoryDialog: text + options. Typically used as event. Actual event is working via Story singleton
